title: Yaoguai Mingdan (Monster List)
synopsis: A foxy temptress. A strange misty tree demon. A girl with the power of the goddess Xianjia! Being caught between these women is a feat in it of itself, but our hero Feng Xi must fight in order to protect the peace and save the world!
characters: ['Su, Jiuer', 'Xi, Feng', 'Guo, Shuang', 'Hehuan', 'Yuan, Long San', 'Wallet God']
